/** 
 * Checks to make sure group membership based userClass works for delete operations.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantDeleteAdministrators() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanDeleteEntryAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("administratorAdd","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { userGroup { \"cn=Administrators,ou=groups,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "       grantsAndDenials { grantRemove, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertFalse(checkCanDeleteEntryAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou"));
  addUserToGroup("billyd","Administrators");
  assertTrue(checkCanDeleteEntryAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou"));
}

Class: org.apache.directory.server.core.authz.LookupAuthorizationIT 

APIUtilityVerifier UtilityVerifier InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

/** 
 * Test a lookup( Dn ) operation with the ACI subsystem enabled
 */
@Test public void testLookupACIEnabled() throws Exception {
  getService().setAccessControlEnabled(true);
  Dn dn=new Dn("cn=test,ou=system");
  try {
    getService().getSession().lookup(dn);
    fail();
  }
 catch (  LdapNoPermissionException lnpe) {
  }
  createAccessControlSubentry("anybodySearch","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  Entry entry=getService().getSession().lookup(dn);
  assertNotNull(entry);
  assertEquals(3,entry.size());
  assertEquals("test",entry.get("cn").getString());
  assertEquals("sn_test",entry.get("sn").getString());
  assertTrue(entry.contains("objectClass","top","person"));
}

Class: org.apache.directory.server.core.authz.ModifyAuthorizationIT 

BooleanVerifier 

@Test public void testSelfModification() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  Modification[] mods=toItems(ModificationOperation.REPLACE_ATTRIBUTE,new DefaultAttribute("userPassword","williams"));
  assertFalse(checkCanSelfModify("billyd","billyd",mods));
  createAccessControlSubentry("selfModifyUserPassword","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { thisEntry }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantModify, grantBrowse, grantRead } "+ "      }, "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {allAttributeValues {userPassword}}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantAdd, grantRemove } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanSelfModify("billyd","billyd",mods));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("selfModifyUserPassword");
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure name based userClass works for modify operations.
 * @throws javax.naming.Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantModifyByName() throws Exception {
  Modification[] mods=toItems(ModificationOperation.ADD_ATTRIBUTE,new DefaultAttribute("telephoneNumber","012-3456"));
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  createAccessControlSubentry("billydAdd","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { name { \"uid=billyd,ou=users,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantModify, grantRead, grantBrowse } "+ "      }, "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantAdd, grantRead, grantRemove } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
}



BooleanVerifier 

@Test public void testPresciptiveACIModification() throws Exception {
  Modification[] mods=toItems(ModificationOperation.ADD_ATTRIBUTE,new DefaultAttribute("registeredAddress","100 Park Ave."));
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  createAccessControlSubentry("modifyACI","{ " + "  identificationTag \"modifyAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantModify, grantBrowse, grantAdd, grantRemove } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  mods=toItems(ModificationOperation.REPLACE_ATTRIBUTE,new DefaultAttribute("registeredAddress","200 Park Ave."));
  changePresciptiveACI("modifyACI","{ " + "  identificationTag \"modifyAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { denyModify } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("modifyACI");
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure allUsers userClass works for modify operations.
 * @throws javax.naming.Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantModifyAllUsers() throws Exception {
  Modification[] mods=toItems(ModificationOperation.ADD_ATTRIBUTE,new DefaultAttribute("telephoneNumber","001-012345"));
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  createAccessControlSubentry("anybodyAdd","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantModify, grantRead, grantBrowse } "+ "      }, "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantAdd, grantRead, grantRemove } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
}



APIUtilityVerifier BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure group membership based userClass works for modify operations.
 * @throws javax.naming.Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantModifyByTestGroup() throws Exception {
  Attribute attr=new DefaultAttribute("registeredAddress","100 Park Ave.");
  Modification[] mods=toItems(ModificationOperation.ADD_ATTRIBUTE,attr);
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  createGroup("TestGroup");
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  createAccessControlSubentry("administratorModifyAdd","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { userGroup { \"cn=TestGroup,ou=groups,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantModify, grantBrowse } "+ "      }, "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems "+ "        {"+ "          attributeType {registeredAddress}, "+ "          allAttributeValues {registeredAddress}"+ "        }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantAdd } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  addUserToGroup("billyd","TestGroup");
  assertTrue(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("administratorModifyAdd");
  mods=toItems(ModificationOperation.REMOVE_ATTRIBUTE,new DefaultAttribute("telephoneNumber","867-5309"));
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  createAccessControlSubentry("administratorModifyRemove","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { userGroup { \"cn=TestGroup,ou=groups,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantModify, grantBrowse } "+ "      }, "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems "+ "        {"+ "          attributeType {telephoneNumber}, "+ "          allAttributeValues {telephoneNumber}"+ "        }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRemove } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("administratorModifyRemove");
  mods=toItems(ModificationOperation.REPLACE_ATTRIBUTE,new DefaultAttribute("telephoneNumber","867-5309"));
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  createAccessControlSubentry("administratorModifyReplace","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { userGroup { \"cn=TestGroup,ou=groups,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantModify, grantBrowse } "+ "      }, "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems "+ "        {"+ "          attributeType {registeredAddress}, "+ "          allAttributeValues {telephoneNumber}"+ "        }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantAdd, grantRemove } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("administratorModifyReplace");
  Attribute changes=new DefaultAttribute("registeredAddress","100 Park Ave.");
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",ModificationOperation.ADD_ATTRIBUTE,changes));
  createAccessControlSubentry("administratorModifyAdd","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { userGroup { \"cn=TestGroup,ou=groups,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantModify, grantBrowse } "+ "      }, "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems "+ "        {"+ "          attributeType {registeredAddress}, "+ "          allAttributeValues {registeredAddress}"+ "        }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantAdd } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",ModificationOperation.ADD_ATTRIBUTE,changes));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("administratorModifyAdd");
  changes=new DefaultAttribute("telephoneNumber","867-5309");
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",ModificationOperation.REMOVE_ATTRIBUTE,changes));
  createAccessControlSubentry("administratorModifyRemove","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { userGroup { \"cn=TestGroup,ou=groups,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantModify, grantBrowse } "+ "      }, "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems "+ "        {"+ "          attributeType {telephoneNumber}, "+ "          allAttributeValues {telephoneNumber}"+ "        }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRemove } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",ModificationOperation.REMOVE_ATTRIBUTE,changes));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("administratorModifyRemove");
  changes=new DefaultAttribute("telephoneNumber","867-5309");
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",ModificationOperation.REPLACE_ATTRIBUTE,changes));
  createAccessControlSubentry("administratorModifyReplace","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { userGroup { \"cn=TestGroup,ou=groups,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantModify, grantBrowse } "+ "      }, "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems "+ "        {"+ "          attributeType {registeredAddress}, "+ "          allAttributeValues {telephoneNumber}"+ "        }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantAdd, grantRemove } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",ModificationOperation.REPLACE_ATTRIBUTE,changes));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("administratorModifyReplace");
}



APIUtilityVerifier InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier 

@Test public void testMaxValueCountProtectedItem() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  createAccessControlSubentry("mvcACI","{" + "  identificationTag \"mvcACI\"," + "  precedence 10,"+ "  authenticationLevel simple,"+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst:"+ "  {"+ "    userClasses { allUsers },"+ "    userPermissions"+ "    {"+ "      {"+ "        protectedItems { entry },"+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantModify, grantBrowse }"+ "      },"+ "      {"+ "        protectedItems"+ "        {"+ "          attributeType { description },"+ "          allAttributeValues { description },"+ "          maxValueCount { { type description, maxCount 1 } }"+ "        } ,"+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRemove, grantAdd }"+ "      }"+ "    }"+ "  }"+ "}");
  Modification[] mods=toItems(ModificationOperation.ADD_ATTRIBUTE,new DefaultAttribute("description","description 1"));
  assertTrue(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  Attribute attr=new DefaultAttribute("description");
  attr.add("description 1");
  attr.add("description 2");
  mods=toItems(ModificationOperation.ADD_ATTRIBUTE,attr);
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  mods=toItems(ModificationOperation.REPLACE_ATTRIBUTE,attr);
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure subtree based userClass works for modify operations.
 * @throws javax.naming.Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantModifyBySubtree() throws Exception {
  Modification[] mods=toItems(ModificationOperation.ADD_ATTRIBUTE,new DefaultAttribute("telephoneNumber","012-345678"));
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
  createAccessControlSubentry("billyAddBySubtree","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses "+ "    {"+ "      subtree { { base \"ou=users,ou=system\" } } "+ "    }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantModify, grantRead, grantBrowse } "+ "      }, "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantAdd, grantRead, grantRemove } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanModifyAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou",mods));
}

Class: org.apache.directory.server.core.authz.MoveRenameAuthorizationIT 

BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure Export and Import permissions work correctly
 * when they are defined on seperate contexts.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testExportAndImportSeperately() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname","ou=groups"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantBrowseForTheWholeNamingContext","{ }","{ " + "  identificationTag \"browseACI\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { userGroup { \"cn=Administrators,ou=groups,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems { entry }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantExportFromASubtree","{ base \"ou=users\" }","{ " + "  identificationTag \"exportACI\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { userGroup { \"cn=Administrators,ou=groups,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems { entry }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantExport, grantRename } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantImportToASubtree","{ base \"ou=groups\" }","{ " + "  identificationTag \"importACI\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { userGroup { \"cn=Administrators,ou=groups,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems { entry }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantImport } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertFalse(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname","ou=groups"));
  addUserToGroup("billyd","Administrators");
  assertTrue(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname","ou=groups"));
  removeUserFromGroup("billyd","Administrators");
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantBrowseForTheWholeNamingContext");
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantExportFromASubtree");
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantImportToASubtree");
  deleteUser("billyd");
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure group membership based userClass works for renames,
 * moves and moves with renames.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantByAdministrators() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameByAdmin","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses "+ "    { "+ "      userGroup { \"cn=Administrators,ou=groups,ou=system\" } "+ "    }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRename, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertFalse(checkCanRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname"));
  addUserToGroup("billyd","Administrators");
  assertTrue(checkCanRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname"));
  removeUserFromGroup("billyd","Administrators");
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameByAdmin");
  deleteUser("billyd");
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname","ou=groups"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameMoveByAdmin","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses "+ "    { "+ "      userGroup { \"cn=Administrators,ou=groups,ou=system\" } "+ "    }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantExport, grantImport, grantRename, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertFalse(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname","ou=groups"));
  addUserToGroup("billyd","Administrators");
  assertTrue(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname","ou=groups"));
  removeUserFromGroup("billyd","Administrators");
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameMoveByAdmin");
  deleteUser("billyd");
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou1","ou=testou2","ou=groups"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantMoveByAdmin","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses "+ "    { "+ "      userGroup { \"cn=Administrators,ou=groups,ou=system\" } "+ "    }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantExport, grantImport, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertFalse(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou1","ou=testou2","ou=groups"));
  addUserToGroup("billyd","Administrators");
  assertTrue(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou1","ou=testou2","ou=groups"));
  removeUserFromGroup("billyd","Administrators");
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantMoveByAdmin");
  deleteUser("billyd");
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure subtree based userClass works for rename, move, and
 * rename with move operation access controls.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantBySubtree() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameByTree","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses "+ "    { "+ "      subtree { { base \"ou=users,ou=system\" } } "+ "    }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRename, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname"));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameByTree");
  deleteUser("billyd");
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname","ou=groups"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameMoveByTree","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: { "+ "    userClasses "+ "    { "+ "      subtree { { base \"ou=users,ou=system\" } } "+ "    }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantExport, grantImport, grantRename, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname","ou=groups"));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameMoveByTree");
  deleteUser("billyd");
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou1","ou=testou2","ou=groups"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantMoveByTree","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses "+ "    { "+ "      subtree { { base \"ou=users,ou=system\" } } "+ "    }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantExport, grantImport, grantRename, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou1","ou=testou2","ou=groups"));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantMoveByTree");
  deleteUser("billyd");
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure the anyUser userClass works for rename, move, and
 * rename with move operation access controls.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantByAnyuser() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameByAny","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRename, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname"));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameByAny");
  deleteUser("billyd");
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname","ou=groups"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameMoveByAny","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantExport, grantImport, grantRename, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname","ou=groups"));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameMoveByAny");
  deleteUser("billyd");
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou1","ou=testou2","ou=groups"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantMoveByAny","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantExport, grantImport, grantRename, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou1","ou=testou2","ou=groups"));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantMoveByAny");
  deleteUser("billyd");
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure name based userClass works for rename, move, and
 * rename with move operation access controls.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantByName() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameByName","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { name { \"uid=billyd,ou=users,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRename, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname"));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameByName");
  deleteUser("billyd");
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou,ou=users","ou=newname","ou=groups"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameMoveByName","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { name { \"uid=billyd,ou=users,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantExport, grantImport, grantRename, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=newname","ou=groups"));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantRenameMoveByName");
  deleteUser("billyd");
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou","ou=testou","ou=groups"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("grantMoveByName","{ " + "  identificationTag \"addAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { name { \"uid=billyd,ou=users,ou=system\" } }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantExport, grantImport, grantRename, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanMoveAndRenameAs("billyd","billyd","ou=testou1","ou=testou2","ou=groups"));
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("grantMoveByName");
  deleteUser("billyd");
}

Class: org.apache.directory.server.core.authz.SearchAuthorizationIT 

BooleanVerifier NullVerifier IgnoredMethod HybridVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks that we can protect a RangeOfValues item
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test @Ignore("The test is currently failing") public void testRangeOfValues() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("rangeOfValues","{ " + "  identificationTag \"rangeOfValuesAci\", " + "  precedence 14,"+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems { entry }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      }, "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems { rangeOfValues (cn=billyd) }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd"));
  for (  Entry result : results.values()) {
    assertNotNull(result.get("cn"));
  }
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure specific attribute values are not present when
 * read permission is denied.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testHidingAttributeValues() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd",3));
  createAccessControlSubentry("excludeOUValue","{ maximum 2 }","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems "+ "        {"+ "          entry, "+ "          attributeType { ou }, "+ "          allAttributeValues { objectClass }, "+ "          attributeValue { ou=0, ou=1, ou=2 } "+ "        }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd",3));
  for (  Entry result : results.values()) {
    assertFalse(result.get("ou").contains("testEntry"));
  }
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("excludeOUValue");
  createAccessControlSubentry("includeAllAttributeTypesAndValues","{ maximum 2 }","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  }"+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd",3));
  for (  Entry result : results.values()) {
    assertTrue(result.get("ou").contains("testEntry"));
  }
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure subtree based userClass works for search operations.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantSearchBySubtree() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("billySearchBySubtree","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses "+ "    { "+ "      subtree "+ "      { "+ "        { base \"ou=users,ou=system\" } "+ "      } "+ "    }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials {  grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd"));
}



BooleanVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure attributeTypes are not present when permissions are
 * not given for reading them and their values.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testHidingAttributes() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd",SearchScope.SUBTREE,4));
  createAccessControlSubentry("excludeTelephoneNumber","{ maximum 2 }","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allAttributeValues { ou, objectClass } }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd",SearchScope.SUBTREE,4));
  for (  Entry result : results.values()) {
    assertNull(result.get("telephoneNumber"));
  }
  deleteAccessControlSubentry("excludeTelephoneNumber");
  createAccessControlSubentry("includeAllAttributeTypesAndValues","{ maximum 2 }","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues }, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    }"+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd",SearchScope.SUBTREE,4));
  for (  Entry result : results.values()) {
    assertNotNull(result.get("telephoneNumber"));
  }
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure group membership based userClass works for add operations.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantAdministrators() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("searchAdmin","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses "+ "    { "+ "      userGroup { \"cn=Administrators,ou=groups,ou=system\" } "+ "    }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertFalse(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd"));
  addUserToGroup("billyd","Administrators");
  assertTrue(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd"));
}



UtilityVerifier InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testLdifFileLoader() throws Exception {
  URL url=getClass().getResource("LdifFileLoader.ldif");
  URL url2=getClass().getResource("LdifFileLoader2.ldif");
  String file=url.getFile();
  String file2=url2.getFile();
  LdifFileLoader loader=new LdifFileLoader(service.getAdminSession(),file);
  int count=loader.execute();
  loader=new LdifFileLoader(service.getAdminSession(),file2);
  count=loader.execute();
  LdapConnection cnx=getConnectionAs("uid=READER ,ou=users,ou=system","secret");
  Entry res=cnx.lookup("uid=READER ,ou=users,ou=system");
  assertNotNull(res);
  try {
    cnx.modify("uid=READER ,ou=users,ou=system",new DefaultModification(ModificationOperation.ADD_ATTRIBUTE,"description","test"));
    fail();
  }
 catch (  LdapNoPermissionException lnpe) {
    assertTrue(true);
  }
  res=cnx.lookup("uid=READER ,ou=users,ou=system");
  assertNotNull(res);
  cnx.unBind();
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure name based userClass works for search operations
 * when we vary the case of the Dn.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantSearchByNameUserDnCase() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanSearchAs("BillyD","billyd"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("billydSearch","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses "+ "    { "+ "      name { \"uid=billyd,ou=users,ou=system\" } "+ "    }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanSearchAs("BillyD","billyd"));
}



BooleanVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

/** 
 * Adds a perscriptiveACI to allow search, tests for success, then adds entryACI
 * to deny read, browse and returnDN to a specific entry and checks to make sure
 * that entry cannot be accessed via search as a specific user.  Here the
 * precidence of the ACI is put to the test.
 * @throws Exception if the test is broken
 */
@Test public void testPerscriptiveGrantWithEntryDenialWithPrecidence() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  String aci="{ " + "  identificationTag \"denyAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { denyRead, denyReturnDN, denyBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}";
  Dn testsDn=new Dn("ou=system");
  assertFalse(checkSearchAsWithEntryACI("billyd","billyd",SearchScope.SUBTREE,testsDn,aci,9));
  createAccessControlSubentry("anybodySearch","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 15, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkSearchAsWithEntryACI("billyd","billyd",SearchScope.SUBTREE,testsDn,aci,10));
  assertNotNull(results.get("ou=tests,ou=system"));
  aci="{ " + "  identificationTag \"denyAci\", " + "  precedence 16, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { denyRead, denyReturnDN, denyBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}";
  assertTrue(checkSearchAsWithEntryACI("billyd","billyd",SearchScope.SUBTREE,testsDn,aci,9));
  assertNull(results.get("ou=tests,ou=system"));
}



BooleanVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

/** 
 * Adds a perscriptiveACI to allow search, tests for success, then adds entryACI
 * to deny read, browse and returnDN to a specific entry and checks to make sure
 * that entry cannot be accessed via search as a specific user.
 * @throws Exception if the test is broken
 */
@Test public void testPerscriptiveGrantWithEntryDenial() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  String aci="{ " + "  identificationTag \"denyAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { denyRead, denyReturnDN, denyBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}";
  Dn testsDn=new Dn("ou=system");
  assertFalse(checkSearchAsWithEntryACI("billyd","billyd",SearchScope.SUBTREE,testsDn,aci,9));
  createAccessControlSubentry("anybodySearch","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkSearchAsWithEntryACI("billyd","billyd",SearchScope.SUBTREE,testsDn,aci,9));
  assertNull(results.get("ou=tests,ou=system"));
  assertTrue(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd",SearchScope.SUBTREE,10));
  assertNotNull(results.get("ou=tests,ou=system"));
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure search does not return entries not assigned the
 * perscriptiveACI and that it does not fail with an exception.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testSelectiveGrantsAllUsers() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd",SearchScope.SUBTREE,4));
  createAccessControlSubentry("anybodySearch","{ maximum 2 }","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd",SearchScope.SUBTREE,4));
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure allUsers userClass works for search operations.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantSearchAllUsers() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("anybodySearch","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses { allUsers }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    } "+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd"));
}



BooleanVerifier 

/** 
 * Checks to make sure name based userClass works for search operations.
 * @throws Exception if the test encounters an error
 */
@Test public void testGrantSearchByName() throws Exception {
  createUser("billyd","billyd");
  assertFalse(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd"));
  createAccessControlSubentry("billydSearch","{ " + "  identificationTag \"searchAci\", " + "  precedence 14, "+ "  authenticationLevel none, "+ "  itemOrUserFirst userFirst: "+ "  { "+ "    userClasses "+ "    { "+ "      name { \"uid=billyd,ou=users,ou=system\" } "+ "    }, "+ "    userPermissions "+ "    { "+ "      { "+ "        protectedItems {entry, allUserAttributeTypesAndValues}, "+ "        grantsAndDenials { grantRead, grantReturnDN, grantBrowse } "+ "      } "+ "    }"+ "  } "+ "}");
  assertTrue(checkCanSearchAs("billyd","billyd"));
}

Class: org.apache.directory.server.core.avltree.ArrayTreeCursorTest 

UtilityVerifier InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testOneEntryCursor() throws Exception {
  ArrayTree tree=new ArrayTree(new IntegerComparator());
  tree.insert(7);
  ArrayTreeCursor cursor=new ArrayTreeCursor(tree);
  assertFalse(cursor.isClosed());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  try {
    cursor.get();
    fail("Should not get here");
  }
 catch (  InvalidCursorPositionException e) {
    assertNotNull(e);
  }
  cursor.beforeFirst();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.afterLast();
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.first());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.last());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(7);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(7);
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(7);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(7);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(9);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(9);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.close();
}



UtilityVerifier InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testManyEntriesCursor() throws Exception {
  ArrayTree tree=new ArrayTree(new IntegerComparator());
  tree.insert(3);
  tree.insert(7);
  tree.insert(10);
  tree.insert(11);
  ArrayTreeCursor cursor=new ArrayTreeCursor(tree);
  assertFalse(cursor.isClosed());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(4,tree.size());
  try {
    cursor.get();
    fail("Should not get here");
  }
 catch (  InvalidCursorPositionException e) {
    assertNotNull(e);
  }
  cursor.beforeFirst();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.afterLast();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.first());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.last());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(2);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(2);
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(3);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(3);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(5);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(5);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(10);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(10);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(11);
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(11);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(20);
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(20);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(20);
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(20);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(11);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(11);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(10);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(10);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(5);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(5);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(3);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(2);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(2);
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.close();
}



UtilityVerifier InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testEmptyCursor() throws Exception {
  ArrayTree tree=new ArrayTree(new IntegerComparator());
  ArrayTreeCursor cursor=new ArrayTreeCursor(tree);
  assertFalse(cursor.isClosed());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  try {
    cursor.get();
    fail("Should not get here");
  }
 catch (  InvalidCursorPositionException e) {
    assertNotNull(e);
  }
  cursor.beforeFirst();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.afterLast();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.first());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.last());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.close();
  assertTrue(cursor.isClosed());
}

Class: org.apache.directory.server.core.avltree.ArrayTreeTest 

UtilityVerifier BooleanVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testGetEmptyTree(){
  ArrayTree tree=createTree();
  try {
    assertNull(tree.get(0));
    fail();
  }
 catch (  ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException aioobe) {
    assertTrue(true);
  }
}



UtilityVerifier BooleanVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testGetEmptyTreeAIOOBException(){
  ArrayTree tree=createTree();
  try {
    tree.get(-1);
    fail();
  }
 catch (  ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException aioobe) {
    assertTrue(true);
  }
  try {
    tree.get(1);
    fail();
  }
 catch (  ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException aioobe) {
    assertTrue(true);
  }
}



InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testFirstAndLast(){
  ArrayTree tree=createTree();
  tree.insert(7);
  assertFalse(tree.isEmpty());
  assertNotNull(tree.getFirst());
  assertNotNull(tree.getLast());
  tree.insert(10);
  assertEquals(2,tree.size());
  assertNotNull(tree.getFirst());
  assertNotNull(tree.getLast());
  assertFalse(tree.getFirst().equals(tree.getLast()));
  assertEquals(SEVEN,tree.getFirst());
  assertEquals(TEN,tree.getLast());
  tree.insert(3);
  assertEquals(THREE,tree.getFirst());
  assertEquals(TEN,tree.getLast());
  tree.insert(11);
  assertEquals(THREE,tree.getFirst());
  assertEquals(ELEVEN,tree.getLast());
}



InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testRemove(){
  ArrayTree tree=createTree();
  tree.insert(3);
  tree.insert(2);
  tree.insert(1);
  LOG.debug(getLinkedText(tree));
  tree.remove(2);
  LOG.debug(getLinkedText(tree));
  assertEquals("1, 3",tree.toString());
  tree.remove(1);
  assertEquals("3",tree.toString());
  assertEquals(THREE,tree.getFirst());
  assertNull(tree.remove(777));
  assertEquals(THREE,tree.remove(3));
  assertTrue(tree.isEmpty());
  tree.insert(37);
  tree.insert(39);
  tree.insert(27);
  tree.insert(38);
  tree.insert(21);
  tree.insert(26);
  tree.insert(43);
  assertEquals("21, 26, 27, 37, 38, 39, 43",tree.toString());
  tree.remove(26);
  assertEquals("21, 27, 37, 38, 39, 43",tree.toString());
  tree.remove(43);
  assertEquals("21, 27, 37, 38, 39",tree.toString());
  tree.remove(39);
  assertEquals("21, 27, 37, 38",tree.toString());
  tree.remove(38);
  assertEquals("21, 27, 37",tree.toString());
  if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {
    tree.printTree();
  }
}



InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testEmpty(){
  ArrayTree tree=createTree();
  assertTrue(tree.isEmpty());
  assertNull(tree.getFirst());
  assertNull(tree.getLast());
  tree.remove(97);
  assertTrue(tree.isEmpty());
  if (LOG.isDebugEnabled()) {
    tree.printTree();
  }
}



InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier 

@Test public void testIsEmptyEmptyTree(){
  ArrayTree tree=createTree();
  assertTrue(tree.isEmpty());
  tree.insert(ONE);
  assertFalse(tree.isEmpty());
  tree.remove(ONE);
  assertTrue(tree.isEmpty());
}

Class: org.apache.directory.server.core.avltree.AvlTreeCursorTest 

UtilityVerifier InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testManyEntriesCursor() throws Exception {
  AvlTree tree=new AvlTreeImpl(new IntegerComparator());
  tree.insert(3);
  tree.insert(7);
  tree.insert(10);
  tree.insert(11);
  AvlTreeCursor cursor=new AvlTreeCursor(tree);
  assertFalse(cursor.isClosed());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(4,tree.getSize());
  try {
    cursor.get();
    fail("Should not get here");
  }
 catch (  InvalidCursorPositionException e) {
    assertNotNull(e);
  }
  cursor.beforeFirst();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.afterLast();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.first());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.last());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(2);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(2);
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(3);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(3);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(5);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(5);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(10);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(10);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(11);
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(11);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(20);
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(20);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(20);
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(20);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(11);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(11);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(10);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(10);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(5);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(5);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(3);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(2);
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(2);
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.close();
}



UtilityVerifier InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testOneEntryCursor() throws Exception {
  AvlTree tree=new AvlTreeImpl(new IntegerComparator());
  tree.insert(7);
  AvlTreeCursor cursor=new AvlTreeCursor(tree);
  assertFalse(cursor.isClosed());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  try {
    cursor.get();
    fail("Should not get here");
  }
 catch (  InvalidCursorPositionException e) {
    assertNotNull(e);
  }
  cursor.beforeFirst();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.afterLast();
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.first());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.last());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.after(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(7);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(7);
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(7);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(7);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.before(9);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(9);
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get());
  cursor.close();
}



UtilityVerifier InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testEmptyCursor() throws Exception {
  AvlTree tree=new AvlTreeImpl(new IntegerComparator());
  AvlTreeCursor cursor=new AvlTreeCursor(tree);
  assertFalse(cursor.isClosed());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  try {
    cursor.get();
    fail("Should not get here");
  }
 catch (  InvalidCursorPositionException e) {
    assertNotNull(e);
  }
  cursor.beforeFirst();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.afterLast();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.first());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.last());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(3);
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.close();
  assertTrue(cursor.isClosed());
}

Class: org.apache.directory.server.core.avltree.AvlTreeMapNoDupsCursorTest 

UtilityVerifier InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testCursor() throws Exception {
  tree.insert(7,7);
  assertFalse(cursor.isClosed());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  try {
    cursor.get();
    fail("Should not get here");
  }
 catch (  InvalidCursorPositionException e) {
    assertNotNull(e);
  }
  cursor.beforeFirst();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.afterLast();
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.first());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.last());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(3,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(3,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(3,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(3,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(7,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(7,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(7,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(7,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(9,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(9,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
}



UtilityVerifier InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testManyEntriesCursor() throws Exception {
  tree.insert(3,3);
  tree.insert(7,7);
  tree.insert(10,10);
  tree.insert(11,11);
  assertFalse(cursor.isClosed());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(4,tree.getSize());
  try {
    cursor.get();
    fail("Should not get here");
  }
 catch (  InvalidCursorPositionException e) {
    assertNotNull(e);
  }
  cursor.beforeFirst();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.afterLast();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.first());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.last());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(2,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(2,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(3,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(3,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(5,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(5,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(10,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(10,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(11,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(11,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(20,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(20,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(20,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(20,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(11,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(11,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(11,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(10,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(10,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(10,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(5,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(7,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(5,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.previous());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(3,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(3,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(2,null));
  assertTrue(cursor.next());
  assertTrue(cursor.available());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getKey());
  assertEquals(3,(int)cursor.get().getValue().getSingleton());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(2,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
}



UtilityVerifier InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testEmptyCursor() throws Exception {
  assertFalse(cursor.isClosed());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  try {
    cursor.get();
    fail("Should not get here");
  }
 catch (  InvalidCursorPositionException e) {
    assertNotNull(e);
  }
  cursor.beforeFirst();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.afterLast();
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.first());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.last());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.next());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  assertFalse(cursor.previous());
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.before(new Tuple>(3,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
  cursor.after(new Tuple>(3,null));
  assertFalse(cursor.available());
}



InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testCursorWithDupValues() throws Exception {
  tree.insert(3,3);
  tree.insert(3,7);
  tree.insert(3,10);
  tree.insert(11,11);
  cursor.next();
  Tuple> t=cursor.get();
  assertEquals(3,t.getKey().intValue());
  assertEquals(AvlTreeImpl.class,t.getValue().getOrderedSet().getClass());
  AvlTree dupsTree=t.getValue().getOrderedSet();
  assertEquals(3,dupsTree.getSize());
  AvlTreeCursor valCursor=new AvlTreeCursor(dupsTree);
  assertTrue(valCursor.next());
  assertEquals(3,valCursor.get().intValue());
  assertTrue(valCursor.next());
  assertEquals(7,valCursor.get().intValue());
  assertTrue(valCursor.next());
  assertEquals(10,valCursor.get().intValue());
  assertFalse(valCursor.next());
  valCursor.close();
}

Class: org.apache.directory.server.core.avltree.AvlTreeMapTest 

InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

/** 
 * checks the root node value(s) when duplicates are allowed and
 * only single node(size one) is present 
 */
@Test public void testRemoveDuplictesOnRoot(){
  AvlTreeMap tree=createTree();
  assertTrue(tree.isDupsAllowed());
  tree.insert(3,4);
  tree.insert(3,5);
  assertEquals(1,tree.getSize());
  assertTrue(4 == tree.remove(3,4));
  assertNotNull(tree.getRoot());
  assertEquals(1,tree.getSize());
  assertTrue(5 == tree.remove(3,5));
  assertNull(tree.getRoot());
  tree.insert(1,1);
  tree.insert(1,2);
  tree.insert(1,3);
  assertNotNull(tree.getRoot());
  assertEquals(1,tree.getSize());
  tree.remove(1);
  assertNull(tree.getRoot());
}



InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testRemoveAll(){
  AvlTreeMapImpl tree=createTree();
  assertNull(tree.insert(3,1));
  tree.insert(37,2);
  assertFalse(tree.isEmpty());
  assertEquals(2,tree.getSize());
  tree.removeAll();
  assertTrue(tree.isEmpty());
  assertEquals(0,tree.getSize());
  assertNull(tree.getFirst());
  assertNull(tree.getLast());
  assertNull(tree.getRoot());
  assertNull(tree.insert(3,1));
  tree.insert(37,2);
  assertFalse(tree.isEmpty());
  assertEquals(2,tree.getSize());
}



InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testRemoveWithoutDupKeys(){
  AvlTreeMap tree=createTree();
  tree=new AvlTreeMapImpl(comparator,comparator,false);
  assertFalse(tree.isDupsAllowed());
  tree.insert(3,4);
  assertTrue(4 == tree.insert(3,5));
  assertEquals(1,tree.getSize());
  assertNotNull(tree.remove(3,5));
  assertNull(tree.getRoot());
}



InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testInsert(){
  AvlTreeMap tree=createTree();
  assertNull(tree.insert(3,1));
  assertFalse(tree.isEmpty());
  assertTrue(1 == tree.insert(3,1));
  assertTrue(1 == tree.getSize());
  assertNotNull(tree.getFirst());
  assertNotNull(tree.getLast());
  assertTrue(tree.getFirst() == tree.getLast());
  tree.remove(3,1);
  tree.insert(37,2);
  tree.insert(70,1);
  tree.insert(12,0);
  assertTrue(3 == tree.getSize());
  tree.insert(90,3);
  tree.insert(25,0);
  tree.insert(99,7);
  tree.insert(91,5);
  tree.insert(24,3);
  tree.insert(28,4);
  tree.insert(26,5);
  tree.remove(24,3);
  assertTrue(tree.getRoot().getLeft().key == 26);
}



InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testRemoveWithKeyOnly(){
  AvlTreeMap tree=createTree();
  assertTrue(tree.isDupsAllowed());
  tree.insert(3,1);
  tree.insert(3,2);
  tree.insert(4,4);
  SingletonOrOrderedSet set=tree.remove(3);
  assertNotNull(set);
  assertNull(tree.find(3));
  AvlTree valueTree=set.getOrderedSet();
  assertNotNull(valueTree);
  assertTrue(2 == valueTree.getSize());
  assertNotNull(valueTree.find(1));
  assertNotNull(valueTree.find(2));
  tree=new AvlTreeMapImpl(comparator,comparator,false);
  tree.insert(7,4);
  set=tree.remove(7);
  assertNotNull(set);
  assertNull(tree.find(7));
  assertTrue(4 == set.getSingleton());
}



InternalCallVerifier BooleanVerifier EqualityVerifier NullVerifier HybridVerifier 

@Test public void testFirstAndLast(){
  AvlTreeMap tree=createTree();
  tree.insert(7,1);
  assertFalse(tree.isEmpty());
  assertNotNull(tree.getFirst());
  assertNotNull(tree.getLast());
  assertTrue(tree.getFirst().getKey().equals(7));
  assertTrue(tree.getFirst().getValue().getSingleton().equals(1));
  tree.insert(10,2);
  assertEquals(2,tree.getSize());
  assertNotNull(tree.getFirst());
  assertNotNull(tree.getLast());
  assertFalse(tree.getFirst().equals(tree.getLast()));
  assertTrue(tree.getFirst().getKey().equals(7));
  assertTrue(tree.getLast().getKey().equals(10));
  tree.insert(3,0);
  assertTrue(tree.getFirst().getKey().equals(3));
  assertTrue(tree.getLast().getKey().equals(10));
  tree.insert(11,1);
  assertTrue(tree.getFirst().getKey().equals(3));
  assertTrue(tree.getLast().getKey().equals(11));
}
